import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Admission = () => { const requirements = [ "Caste Certificate (proof of SC category)", "Identity Proof (Aadhaar card, etc.)", "Address Proof", "Proof of Student Status (college admission letter or ID)", "Income Certificate (if applicable)" ]; const hostels = [ { name: "Govt. Post-Matric SC Boys Hostel", location: "Katara Hills, Bhopal", established: "2007", contact: "9826087556", superintendent: "Rajeev Saxena" }, { name: "Govt. Senior SC Boys Hostel", location: "Bhadbhada Road, Bhopal", established: "1967", contact: "9981984763", superintendent: "Mr. K.S. Gangwar" } ]; return (

))}

))}

Application Letter Guidelines

); }; export default Admission;
